dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3293 IH: Support Procurement Of Our Nation’s Stainless Steel Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney (for herself and Mr. Lipinski) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend section 2533a of title 10, United States Code, to add stainless steel flatware to the list of covered items in such section.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Support Procurement Of Our Nation’s Stainless Steel Act of 2017 or the SPOONSS Act.

section.header: Addition of domestically produced stainless steel flatware to the Berry Amendment

subsection.text: Section 2533a(b) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

Section 2533a(b)(3) of title 10, United States Code, as added by subsection (a), shall apply with respect to contracts entered into after the date occurring 1 year after the date of the enactment of this Act.
